articles.title: Piyaa Albela actress Sheen Dass in top running to replace Nehha Pendse in Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain | EXCLUSIVE - India TV News
articles.description: Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain will soon get a new face in the role of Anita Mishra aka Gori Mem and actress Nehha Pendse has decided to move on from the comedy show after a year of playing the role. We gather that Sheen Dass is in the running to replace her.

articles.title: Pushpa actor Rashmika Mandanna says Goodbye co-star Amitabh Bachchan is a 'doll' - India Today
articles.description: In an exclusive interview with IndiaToday.in, Rashmika Mandanna spoke about sharing screen space with Amitabh Bachchan in Goodbye. She called him a 'doll'.

articles.author: etimes.in
articles.title: Ayushmann Khurrana starrer ‘Anek’ gets postponed; to release on May 13, 2022 - Times of India
articles.description: Bollywood actor Ayushmann Khurrana’s upcoming flick ‘Anek’ has changed its theatrical release date to May 13, 2022.
